patthana21.9:1.1_0: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sāsavo ceva noāsavo ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.9:2.1_0: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.9:3.1_0: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
